member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.createBanner(System.String,Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.AdFormat,Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.AdHorizontalAlignment,Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.AdVerticalAlignment,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an ad banner. Note that testMode doesn't yet work in the AdMob SDK.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.removeBanner
member.summary: Removes the ad banner from the view

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.loadInterstitial(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends out a request to load an interstitial. Note that testMode doesn't yet work in the AdMob SDK.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.showInterstitial
member.summary: Shows an interstitial as long as one is loaded

member.name: E:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.receivedAdEvent
member.summary: Fired when a banner successfully loaded an ad

member.name: E:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.failedToReceiveAdEvent
member.summary: Fired when a banner has failed to load (typically because of network failure, an application configuration error, or a lack of ad inventory)

member.name: E:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.dismissingOverlayEvent
member.summary: Fired after an interstitial/overlay is dismissed

member.name: E:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.showingOverlayEvent
member.summary: Fired before an interstitial/overlay is shown

member.name: E:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.interstitialReceivedAdEvent
member.summary: Fired when an interstitial successfully loaded an ad

member.name: E:Prime31.WinPhoneAdMob.WinPhoneAdMob.interstitialFailedToReceiveAdEvent
member.summary: Fired when an interstitial has failed to load (typically because of network failure, an application configuration error, or a lack of ad inventory)
